t: Watch Wish | Prime Video
s: In this animated musical-comedy, Asha, a sharp-witted idealist, makes a powerful wish that’s answered by Star, a ball of boundless energy. Soon, Asha and Star must face a formidable foe and prove that one brave human can make wondrous things happen.

t: Here's how shopping on Wish, the $8.7 billion site that sells Chinese goods at rock-bottom prices, compares to Amazon
s: April 16, 2019 - Wish is a platform that nearly exclusively sells goods produced in China for rock-bottom prices. The company's CEO told Forbes this month that he rebuffed possible acquisition interest from Amazon in 2016.

t: Meet The Billionaire Who Defied Amazon And Built Wish, The World’s Most-Downloaded E-Commerce App
s: March 7, 2024 - Peter Szulczewski’s Wish was the world’s most downloaded shopping app last year. Its ultra-cheap wares make Walmart look like Bergdorf, but his 90 million users can’t afford to care—and their impulse purchases have added up to a $1.4 billion fortune for Szulczewski.

t: Wish (company) - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - On August 27, 2020, Which? bought six popular products from Wish. One of the items was a child's car seat, which was found to be similar to ones from eBay, Amazon Marketplace, and AliExpress. The car seats from said retailers are dubbed "killer car seats".
